purpose: The code appears to collect system information including internal and external IP addresses, DNS settings, and package details, then sends this data to a Discord webhook.
anomalies: Sending sensitive system information to external server
Use of deprecated or problematic package.json property ___resolved
Potential information disclosure through external IP lookup
analysis: This code is clearly malicious as it collects extensive system information including IP addresses, user details, and package metadata, then exfiltrates this data to a Discord webhook. The hardcoded webhook URL indicates this is likely part of a larger malicious payload designed to report system information to attackers.
conclusion: Highly suspicious and potentially malicious code that performs data exfiltration to an external Discord webhook.
